snippet: Lindsey Vonn won the season-opening downhill in Lake Louise, Alberta, beating her American teammate Stacey Cook by 1.73 seconds.
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn won the season-opening downhill in Lake Louise, Alberta, beating her American teammate Stacey Cook by 1.73 seconds.

headline.seo: Back From Illness, Lindsey Vonn Takes Downhill
headline.main: Back From Illness, Vonn Takes Downhill
headline.print_headline: Back From Illness, Vonn Takes Downhill
